languages.text:
Cyber Mastif has +25 Weapon Skill, +50% Wounds and +300% Damage
While {g|f:b642b445adc04242ba616c3e98125972}Roaming{/g}, Mastiff has a {uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} Critical Hit Chance and it's attacks inflict {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} Bleeding on Critical Hit.

traits.locale_text:
Cyber Mastif has +25 Weapon Skill, +50% Wounds and +300% Damage
While {g|f:b642b445adc04242ba616c3e98125972}Roaming{/g}, Mastiff has a {uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} Critical Hit Chance and it's attacks inflict {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} Bleeding on Critical Hit.

languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
While in {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}battle mode: standby{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g} is increased by +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%, and its critical {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} inflict {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} levels of {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Кибермастиф получает +25 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g}, +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимальному здоровью{/g} и наносит на 300% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
В {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}автономном режиме{/g} шанс его {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического попадания{/g} увеличивается на {uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%, а критические {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} накладывают {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} уровней {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечения{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +25 Weapon Skill. Its maximum wounds are increased by +50% and it deals +300% more damage.
While in {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}standby mode{/g}, the cyber-mastiff's critical hit chance is increased by +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%, and its critical hits inflict {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} levels of bleeding.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliği kazanır. {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}Maksimum sağlık{/g} puanı +%50 artar ve +%300 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Savaş Modu: Otonom{/g} hâlindeki siber mastifin {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş olasılığı{/g}, +%{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} artar ve kritik {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşları{/g} da {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} seviye {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kanamaya{/g} sebep olur.

languages.text:
El cibermastín recibe +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Mientras esté en {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Modo de combate: A la espera{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g} del cibermastín aumenta en un +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % y sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impactos{/g} críticos infligen {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} niveles de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}.

El cibermastín recibe +25 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}. Sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} aumentan en un +50 % e inflige un +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.

languages.text:
生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高25点，{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}提高50%，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高300%。
当生化獒犬处于{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}状态时，{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%，且每次{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}暴击{/g}都会造成{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}级{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}效果。
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
生化獒犬的武器技能提高25点，最大生命值提高50%，造成的伤害提高300%。
当生化獒犬处于{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}战斗模式：自由行动{/g}状态时，暴击率提高{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%，且每次暴击都会造成{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}级流血效果。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} werden um +50 % erhöht, und er verursacht +300 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Im {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Bereitschaft{/g} wird die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs um +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % erhöht, und seine kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} verursachen {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}. Its {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} are increased by +50%, and it deals +300% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +25 Waffenfähigkeit. Seine maximalen Wunden werden um +50 % erhöht, und er verursacht +300 % mehr Schaden.
Im {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Bereitschaft{/g} wird die kritische Trefferchance des Cyber-Mastiffs um +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % erhöht, und seine kritischen Treffer verursachen {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} Stufen Blutung.

Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +25 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g}. Seine {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} werden um +50 % erhöht, und er verursacht +300 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
Im {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Kampfmodus: Bereitschaft{/g} wird die {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g} des Cyber-Mastiffs um +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % erhöht, und seine kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} verursachen {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} Stufen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Blutung{/g}.

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} +25. Ses {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g} sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Tant qu'il est en {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Mode de combat : Standby{/g}, le cyber-mastiff bénéficie d'un bonus de +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % aux{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g}, et ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coups{/g} critiques infligent {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} niveaux de {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}.
languages.original_text:

traits.locale_text:
Le cyber-mastiff reçoit un bonus de Capacité de combat +25. Ses blessures maximum sont augmentées de +50 %, et il inflige +300 % de dégâts supplémentaires.
Tant qu'il est en {g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}Mode de combat : Standby{/g}, le cyber-mastiff bénéficie d'un bonus de +{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c} % aux chances de coup critique, et ses coups critiques infligent {unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus} niveaux de Saignement.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が+25される。{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大の傷{/g}が+50%増加し、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+300%される。
{g|f:11251c47c7b14a87824cffe48ea6374d}戦闘モード：スタンバイ{/g}の場合、サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+{uip|Critchance|0428b4d435254ec4af3db36b75bfd64c}%増加し、そのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}により{unit_stat|WarhammerStrength|bonus}レベルの{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}が起きる。
